thread.title: Valentine, LeVert earn preseason All-Big Ten honors
thread.title_full: Valentine, LeVert earn preseason All-Big Ten honors

author: detroitnews.com
title: Valentine, LeVert earn preseason All-Big Ten honors
text:
Michigan State guard Denzel Valentine was a unanimous selection to the preseason All-Big Ten team. (Photo: Dale G. Young, Detroit News) 
Two seniors, Michigan State’s Denzel Valentine and Michigan’s Caris LeVert were named to the preseason All-Big Ten team Wednesday.
Valentine, a 6-foot-5 guard, was a unanimous selection. He averaged 14.5 points, 6.3 rebounds and 4.3 assists last season. LeVert, a 6-5 guard, was named to the team for the second straight season. He averaged 14.9 points, 4.9 rebounds and 3.7 assists before missing the final 14 games after undergoing surgery on his left foot.
Maryland sophomore guard Melo Trimble was named preseason player of the year by a vote of conference media.
Michigan State also had two players on the women’s All-Big Ten preseason teams. Six-foot junior forward Aerial Powers was on both teams selected by the coaches and the media, while 5-8 junior guard Tori Jankoska was named to the media first team.
The Spartans are picked third in the preseason Big Ten poll.
Preseason All-Big Ten Team (men) 
James Blackmon Jr., Indiana
Yogi Ferrell, Indiana
Jarrod Uthoff, Iowa
Jake Layman, Maryland
* Melo Trimble, Maryland (preseason player of the year)
Caris LeVert, Michigan 
* Denzel Valentine, Michigan State 
* A.J. Hammons, Purdue
* Nigel Hayes, Wisconsin
Bronson Koenig, Wisconsin
* — unanimous selection
Women’s preseason All-Big Ten Team (coaches) 
Ally Disterhoft, Jr., G, Iowa
Brionna Jones, Jr., C, Maryland
Shatori Walker-Kimbrough, Jr., G, Maryland
Aerial Powers, Jr., F, Michigan State 
Rachel Banham, Sr., G, Minnesota
Rachel Theriot, Sr., G, Nebraska
* Nia Coffey, Jr., F, Northwestern
Ameryst Alston, Sr., G, Ohio State
* Kelsey Mitchell, So., G, Ohio State (preseason player of the year)
Kahleah Copper, Sr., F/G, Rutgers
* — unanimous selection
Women’s preseason All-Big Ten Team (media) 
Brionna Jones, Jr., C, Maryland
Shatori Walker-Kimbrough, Jr., G, Maryland
Tori Jankoska, Jr., G, Michigan State 
Aerial Powers, Jr., F, Michigan State 
Rachel Banham, Sr., G, Minnesota
Rachel Theriot, Sr., G, Nebraska
Nia Coffey, Jr., F, Northwestern
Ameryst Alston, Sr., G, Ohio State
* Kelsey Mitchell, So., G, Ohio State
Kahleah Copper, Sr., F/G, Rutgers
* — unanimous selection
